message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $180. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $120?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $140. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. Could we possibly agree on $130? This would allow me to stay within my budget while still getting a good deal on the product.
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can offer the product to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really like it!
Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
